meanings.definition: A person who asserts or makes a positive statement.
meanings.sent1: The asserters in the meeting confidently shared their opinions.
meanings.sent2: The asserters in the debate were vocal about their viewpoints.
meanings.sent3: The asserters at the party kept insisting on playing their favorite song.
meanings.sent4: The asserters in the courtroom stood firm in their beliefs like pillars.
meanings.sent5: The asserters in the group discussion were like shining stars, guiding the conversation.

meanings.definition: Those who assert or maintain a claim or belief.
meanings.sent1: The asserters of the theory presented strong evidence to support their claim.
meanings.sent2: The asserters of the tradition upheld their beliefs with pride.
meanings.sent3: The asserters at the picnic were adamant about their choice of snacks.
meanings.sent4: The asserters in the family were the foundation of their shared values.
meanings.sent5: The asserters in the classroom were like beacons of certainty, guiding their peers.
